General.Name: Orderyoyo AS
General.Description: OrderYOYO A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides online ordering, payment, and marketing software solutions in Denmark, the United Kingdom, Germany, Austria, and Ireland. The company offers solutions as Software-as-a-Service and enables small independent takeaway restaurants to build their own-branded online presence direct to consumers. It also provides an integrated end-to-end software solution that includes a website, mobile apps, order-payment processing, menu management systems, business intelligence and user data analytics, Google optimization, social media promotion tools, email marketing, and restaurant partner customer support services. The company was formerly known as iWaiterApp ApS and changed its name to OrderYOYO ApS in June 2016. OrderYOYO ApS was founded in 2014 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
